test.name: Empty list can have item added

kw.name: Open TodoMVC Page Using Chrome Browser
Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Not Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.name: WHEN I add a todo for
Wait Until Element Is Enabled
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is enabled.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Buy cheese' into text field '//input[@class='new-todo']'.

kw.name: Press Keys
kw.doc: Simulates the user pressing key(s) to an element or on the active browser.
kw.msg: Pressing special key RETURN to element.

kw.name: THEN Only that item is listed
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

Click Link
kw.doc: Clicks a link identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.name: AND The filter is unset to
Wait Until Page Contains Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` appears on the current page.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.name: WHEN The item is selected for edit
Double Click Element
kw.doc: Double clicks the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Then the item cannot be completed
Wait Until Page Does Not Contain Element
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` disappears from the current page.

kw.name: And the item cannot be removed
Mouse Over
kw.doc: Simulates hovering the mouse over the element ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is not visible.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
